description: R2 offers players to pick from 14 different classic SNK fighters (plus a few hidden ones), ranging from Kyo Kusanagi to the ever-popular Mai Shiranui. Next to a variety of punches and kicks pulled off by pushing the stick into a direction while hitting either A or B, there are more than 10 special moves for EACH fighter, ranging from simple "Hadokens" like Athena's Psychoball Attack to complex moves like Shermie's Carnival. There are two ways to play: Extra Mode and the more complex Advanced Mode. Depending on which mode you select, the game features a slightly different power gauge system. In Extra Mode, players can manually fill up their power meter. When it's full, it enables super power moves, body tosses and emergency escape maneuvers. In the Advanced Mode, the gauge increases with each successful blow, then players manually activate the MAX Power Mode to pull off super special moves.

title: Paperboy
description: In PAPERBOY, all you have to do is deliver the newspaper to your subscribers. While this sounds easy enough, obstacles seem to constantly get into your way...things like dogs, kids on tricycles, traffic, and pedestrians. Since this is your neighborhood, you want punish those who do not subscribe to your paper, so you break their windows with rolled up newspapers. You will even hear the glass shatter thanks to the digitized sound effects and music! At the end of each level there is a bonus course, where you can demonstrate your newspaper-flinging accuracy and earn bonus points. Fortunately, there are three difficulty levels to help you get accustomed to the controls of the game. Will you become the master of your neighborhood or just another punk on a bike? Play PAPERBOY and find out.
platforms: GBC GBA Arcade LCD Cell CPC ZX Lynx GG iPhone GB C64 NES Gen SMS Xbox 360

title: Force 21
description: Force 21 is a real-time 3D tactical wargame that combines strategic and tactical play to take you into the future of war. You command an American or Chinese armored force, and control up to 16 platoons of tanks, helicopters, artillery, combat engineers, and electronic warfare units.

title: NFL Blitz 2000
description: NFL BLITZ 2000 is the updated version of the popular NFL BLITZ. All of the arcade-style football action has returned, including seven-on-seven play, bone-crunching hits, big plays, and no referees. However, there have been several gameplay improvements. There are more plays to choose from this year, but if none of them are acceptable, create your own with the Play Editor. And, changing plays at the line of scrimmage is a breeze with the new audible system. Wisely using audibles and playing well will result in your team being "on fire," giving your players boosted abilities. Try these new abilities out on three of your friends in the Tournament mode, or challenge all of the teams in the league in the Arcade mode. If your goal is to win the Super Bowl, guide your team to victory in the Season mode. NFL BLITZ 2000 has action so intense; your mama will feel it.

title: Joust / Defender
description: If you're really looking for arcade hits, you can't get much bigger than JOUST and DEFENDER. Lording over the game halls in the days after PAC-MAN and DONKEY KONG had lost their luster, these two giants revolutionized gaming forever. JOUST casts you in the role of a noble knight from the future mounting you on an ostrich and sending you off into battle. Making full use of the ostrich, you'll try to gain altitude and get your opponent from above, collecting magical eggs for extra points. DEFENDER puts you in the pilot's seat of an aerodynamic space ship and shoots you through the expanses of a futuristic city under siege. You'll have to fend off other spacecraft, utilize a whole lot of impressive weaponry, and keep the civilians from turning into ugly mutants. Both games are notable for their influence over those to follow, and both are replicated in fine detail for the Game Boys Color. Challenge the computer, or link up and do battle with a friend.

title: Pokemon Pinball
description: In PokÃ©mon Pinball, one thing is obvious: the design team took the existing pinball engine of Kirby's Pinball Land for the Game Boy, and converted it into another machine altogether. In the game, you whack a Pokeball around a pinball machine that's constructed of PokÃ©mon-related obstacles and structures. There are two machines, Red and Blue, and each machine has its own techiques, challenges, bonus levels, and PokÃ©mon. Yep, the idea in the game is to capture PokÃ©mon. How? Well, each machine has its own way of finding the creatures, but once you find it, it's all a matter of hitting it six times with your Pokeball. They'll appear in the center screen, and if you manage to catch a PokÃ©mon, it'll sit in your built-in Pokedex. Each machine will also give you the ability to evolve captured PokÃ©mon, since some creatures are not out in the wild. What happens when you manage to get all 150 PokÃ©mon?

title: Man of War II: Chains of Command
description: Man of War II: Chains of Command is the sequel to Strategy First?s original game, Man of War. Man of War and its sequel both take place during the late 1700s and early 1800s, a time of war between Great Britain and France. It was during this time that England was at war with Napoleon and while Napoleon?s armies marched across Europe, it was England that controlled the seas. Starting from Captain, rise in rank to Admiral where you control your fleet and in the course of battle possibly re-write history.

title: Animaniacs: A Gigantic Adventure
description: It seems that the nefarious Warner Bros. CEO, Thaddeus J. Plotz, has hidden some of the company's movie classics among the studio's back lots. Now, it's up to Yakko, Wakko, and Dot to find the movies, as well as a slew of classic posters and awards that have disappeared. Taking place on an ocean cruiser set, the 11 levels of play will truly put your skills to the test as you come up against a slew of menaces and obstacles along the way. A powerful boss character guards each level, but some creative weaponry will help you in your noble pursuits.

title: KO
description: A realistic boxing simulation for the PC? Believe it or not, the sweet science is replicated in stunning detail, right on your computer screen. Choose a boxer; customize his power, speed, stamina, and more. Start out learning the ropes against a sparring partner, then set out to rise through the ranks against the hard-hitting pros. Teach yourself unstoppable combos, build up your stamina, and see if you have what it takes to become the king of the ring. Play alone or take on a friend in a championship bout.

title: Soulcalibur
description: Sharpen your blades for fights against formidable adversaries in Soulcalibur.  Play as one of the 19 characters on a mission to acquire the Soul Edge!

title: NASCAR 2000
description: Real-life NASCAR action has never been so thrilling, as the popular sport returns to the N64. The competition gets heated, as actual auto-racing announcers provide live commentary lending one of many realistic touches to this EA Sports game. Choose from 40 different NASCAR drivers--including Jeff Gordon, Dale Earnhardt Jr., Dale Jarrett and Tony Stewart or create your own completely original driver to compete against them. Each driver's car is replicated in perfect detail (right down to the decals), and each is configured exactly as it was for the 1999 season. The 18 licensed tracks including Sears Point, Atlanta Motor Speedway, and Michigan Speedway are all accurate replicas as well. Featuring smooth, solid controls, NASCAR 2000 also boasts some of the most incredible effects imaginable. You can make lots of modifications to your vehicle, and "NASCAR Options" allows you to make the action more or less realistic, depending on your preferences. If you enjoyed NASCAR '99, you'll love the updated stats and the extra track included in the 2000 edition.

title: Legacy of Kain: Soul Reaver
description: In the second chapter of the epic to Blood Open/Legacy of Kain franchise, you jump into the world of Raziel, a member in Kain's vampire army. After defying Kain's authority, you are sentenced to damnation in the Lake of the Dead. After having your body torn apart by the water that acts like acid on vampires, you are merely a shell of your former self. As an a member of the undead ranks, you have the ability to pass between the Spectral Plane and the Material Plane as you seek revenge on your former master. But you'll notice that the two realms are vastly different as are your abilities in each, which you'll have to use to your advantage on your quest for vengeance. Learn how to use the two different realms to your advantage in this adventure game that will test your logical skills as well as your fighting skills. Work your way through two vastly different worlds as you seek revenge and retribution against your former leader.

title: The Legend of Zelda: Link's Awakening DX
description: Nintendo's fantasy adventure hero, Link of Hyrule, returns in the epic quest The Legend of Zelda: Link's Awakening. This adventure is set on the mysterious Koholint Island, a place where dreams and reality collide. As a castaway, Link must find a way to escape from the island and return to his beloved homeland of Hyrule.But it won't be as easy as chartering a boat. The island's inhabitants have no knowledge of the outside world. One creature, a talking owl, may know the solution to Link's dilemma, but first Link must tackle eight dungeons full of treacherous monsters and tricky traps. His goal: find the eight Instruments of the Sirens and awaken the omnipotent Wind Fish which rules the island. Link must battle new enemies and make new friends in order to make it to the end of this in-depth fantasy story.Colorized for Game Boy Color, this revised DX version of the Game Boy Classic features a new dungeon to explore (playable exclusively on Game Boy Color) as well as the ability to take pictures and print them using the Game Boy Printer.

title: Darkstone
description: Enter the world of Darkstone and leave your identity at the door. Surviving this medieval world, living under the shadow of a nefarious dragon, will require nothing less than a complete transformation. As a knight, monk, thief, or sorcerer, you will creep through dungeons, explore towns and wilderness, and slay armies of nasty enemies on your quest to collect seven crystals that can defeat your fire breathing nemesis. An extremely cool feature of Darkstone is that when a new game is started, a completely fresh quest is randomly generated, in turn creating new floor plans for each of the 32 levels you'll face. This ensures that no two games will ever be alike, making this a dream come true in terms of replayability.

title: Sid Meier's Civilization II: Test of Time
description: Civilization II is a turn-based strategy game where you attempt to lead your people to success by either conquering the world or being the first civilization to have your spaceship reach another planet. You begin the game in 4000 BC with a group of settlers and knowledge of a few early scientific advancements. Civilization II allows you to found cities and manage them through a variety of ways. Contact with other civilizations opens up the game a great deal by allowing alliances to be formed, the trading of advancements and the beginning of conflicts that can lead to war.

title: Tarzan Untamed
description: Tarzan Untamed is based on Disney's animated adaptation of Edgar Rice Burroughs' Tarzan. It picks up from where Disney's movie ended and sees Tarzan, his girlfriend Jane and his friend Terk fighting against an evil explorer who is filming in the jungle and collecting animal specimens for his trip home.Gameplay is spread across 15 different levels where the player must save animals that have been trapped by the evil explorer and pick of rolls of film dropped by him. Explore immense worlds such as the Swamp and Elephant Graveyard, plunging deep into 3D jungle environments.

title: Pocket Tennis Color
description: This sports favorite boasts eight playable characters and enough tennis action to keep any fan happy. Enjoy realistic play that gives you complete array of shots, including lobs, high-speed smashes and more. Exhibition mode sets up a single match against the computer, or, with the NeoGeo Cable Link (sold separately), a friend. Tournament mode pits you against stiff competition to see if you've got what it takes to earn the title. Save your match results so you can brag later. Record mode lets you relax and enjoy your on-court accomplishments by viewing your records and trophies.

title: The Operational Art of War II: Modern Battles 1956-2000
description: Strategy wargame. This highly detailed game allows you to recreate conflicts set between 1956 and the present day. (The period 1939-55 was conferred in the first game of the series). The complex nature of this game means that the game takes time to master and the level of detail appeals to the more die-hard strategist.

title: Mob Rule
description: Gangster-themed strategy game. You take the role of a wanna-be gangster boss who must build up his criminal empire. In order to do this you have extend control of an area of the city and use the profits to expand and recruit new members your gang. The nature of the game nature and its inclusion of adult themes makes it unsuitable for the younger gamer. Various 'unit' types are available to you the most important are muscle men whose weapons can be upgraded as your progress. Other types include prostitutes, hitmen and fixers. The multi-player mode will allow up to four people to play over LAN or on-line. The game incorporates a useful tutorial. The graphics and control system are generally effective. However, at initial release the game suffered from some significant bugs.
rating_content: Animated Blood and Gore, Comic Mischief, Mature Sexual Themes

title: All Star Tennis '99
description: Hammer aces as one of eight licensed world-class pros in Ubi Soft's ALL STAR TENNIS '99. Wield the fierce racket of Michael Chang, Amanda Coetzer, Richard Krajicek, Gustavo Kuerten, Conchita Martinez, Jana Novotna, and Mark Philippoussis. You can also play as one of four fictional players on eight different courts: Wimbledon, Mediterranean, California, Paris, Italy, Saudi Arabia, Japan and Australia. The intricate and detailed gameplay provides you with six fearsome shots to select from: slice, smash, backspin, topspin, lob, and volley. In addition, each player possesses a patented special shot. With three intense modes and four-player capability, the gameplay options are seemingly endless. Challenge the best in the world in Arcade mode, drive the ball past your opponent in Smash mode and get blown away in the explosive Bomb mode. For some extra competition, get seven friends together and volley for the championship crown in tournament play.

title: Missile Command [1980]
description: The arcade classic MISSILE COMMAND has made its way to the Game Boy Color. The concept of the game is simple: missiles come from the top of the screen, and you are trying to defend the six buildings in the city below. Your goal is to target the missiles and fire your defensive weaponry; if the cloud from your weapon touches the missile, it is destroyed. However, you only have a limited number of shots, and if all sections of the city are destroyed, it's Game Over. After successfully defending a city from two waves of missiles, you will be treated to a special animation that is related to the city. If your friends want to get in on the action, there is an alternating Two-Player mode. Try to defend the world's cities from destruction in MISSILE COMMAND.

title: Extreme Mountain Biking
description: The entire Trek team is at your disposal, allowing you to select your bike, rider, and licensed track. There are eight different bike models to choose from including the Pro Downhill, VRX, and popular Cross Country Hardtail and a dozen male and female riders. The game's 15 tracks will test your abilities on trails, gate racing, downhill, and single-track, and the 3D graphics are simply awe-inspiring. Loaded up with more tricks than a magician's trunk, EXTREME MOUNTAIN BIKING lets you choose your camera angles in order to provide the ultimate riding experience.

title: Madden NFL 2000
description: The Madden PC series takes a major step forward with the release of Madden NFL 2000. Offering all the action of NFL football, Madden 2000 contains all the current NFL teams, rosters and stadiums, along with special "classic" teams and stadiums. Play an exhibition game or a whole season; draft and coach a team through multiple season, or go online and compete on EAFootball.net -- win the Super Bowl over and over!

title: R/C Stunt Copter
description: Don't waste your money on expensive remote controlled helicopters when you can get all of the action and excitement in RC STUNT COPTER for the PlayStation. Start the game by working your way through the 10 stage Tutorial mode where you learn how to pilot your aircraft. Luckily, the training ship comes with training skids that keep you from crashing. How well you perform in the Training mode determines which copters you open up for the single-player game. The Rookie copter is the machine you use during the training levels, the Pilot ship doesn't have an auto-level but does have the training skids, and the Captain class doesn't have the training skids or the auto-level, and the Ace can fly upside down allowing for all kinds of crazy stunts. Try to master flying a helicopter in RC STUNT COPTER.

title: LEGO Racers
description: Zoom around on lots of cool tracks all comprised of classic LEGO settings. You get to customize your racer with different bricks and pieces, ultimately creating your very own LEGO dream machine. Many of the familiar faces from the age-old series of toys make appearances Sam Grant and Captain Redbeard, among others, show up as drivers. There are plenty of secret items and important shortcuts to discover, so keep your eyes on the road at all times. LEGOs have never been this exciting before.
platforms: PC N64 Cell Web PS GBC
rating_content: Suitable for Persons Ages Six and Older

title: R-Type Delta
description: It's the year 2163, and the Bydo Empire has resurfaced with new plans to destroy Earth. Bydo's Mortiz-G doomsday weapon has the capacity to eliminate the fair planet for good, and you stand as humanity's last hope. To save the planet, you'll commandeer one of three awesome ships: the R9a, which boasts an energy-dispersing cannon; the Rx, a ship that features wave cannons, a time disruption corridor, a chain reaction missile, and a tentacle force; and the R13, which uses a lightning cannon, a photon missile, and a claw-shaped anchor force. The game's seven broad, detailed levels all contain Force power-ups, which attach to your ship to help protect you against enemy fire. The more Force power-ups you collect, the more deadly your firepower will be. You'll battle Mecha-Bydo warriors throughout demolished streets, a run-down energy reactor, a space fortress, and a ripple in time. Can Earth count on you to have the bravery and reflexes to save mankind?

title: Clans
description: Long ago, four clans were pitted against each other, and their warring nearly killed off all of society. Once they realized that their ongoing feud was by design of an evil demon, however, they banded together and formed the mythical Crown of Peace. As the pact faded throughout the years, the Barbarians, Elves, Dwarves, and Warriors began to war again, and now it's up to one representative from each group to work together in reclaiming the crown and stopping the battles.Clans is a fantasy action/adventure game in which you assume the role of one of four champions selected by your Clan to restore peace and order to the world. Your goal is to confront and destroy the Demon and locate the lost Crown of Peace. You will roam your once-beautiful land, routing out the Demon's hateful minions, solving the mysteries of the fortress, and moving ever closer to your final encounter with the Demon.

title: NFL Quarterback Club 2000
description: The best just got better. Taking over where original series developer Iguana left off, Acclaim has designed the most detailed, inclusive football game to date. All 31 NFL teams are included, as are the updated rosters and logos for each franchise. If you want to play General Manager, go ahead and make any trades you'd like just look out for that salary cap. Choose from six different weather conditions, play day or night games, select your difficulty level, and indicate whether you'd like injuries on or off. You can even take your pick of six different celebrations for touchdowns and sacks. The game's stellar graphics are only enhanced by the inclusion of 16 camera angles, plus the ability to make your own angle. You can of course create your own players, play a game, season, or playoffs, and set your own lineups. Players that are under your control are easily identified by their number, name, or position, and all of the stats and player characteristics are in place. There are a few hidden stadiums, teams and other treats as well, but the real attraction is the true-to-life, rough-and-tumble NFL action.

title: Revelations: The Demon Slayer
description: A mystical force known as Gaia permeates every aspect of the planet. Those who are aware of the force can manipulate it to do their bidding. While most use Gaia for good, there are those who would use it for evil. You take the role of El, who must journey around the world in hopes of stopping those who want to use Gaia for evil. Along the way, you will encounter new friends that will aid you in the quest. Ultimately, you will encounter monsters, and if you're lucky, you'll be able to convince the monsters to join you. When a monster has joined the party, it can be summoned to help in battle. While the monster will not gain experience, it can be combined with other creatures to create a more powerful monster. Try to keep Gaia pure and evil free in REVELATIONS: The Demon Slayer.

title: Shadow Man
description: Explore the world of voodoo with Shadow Man. You play the role of Mike LeRoi, an ordinary man with one unique trait: the ability to traverse between the worlds of the living and the dead. Armageddon is fast approaching, and you're the only person who can stop it. Under the guidance of voodoo priestess, Mama Nettie, your mission is to absorb the blackest souls on the Deadside before an evil entity known as Legion does. As the Shadow Man, you have different abilities while on the Liveside, including the ability to use weapons, like a shotgun and machine gun. While on the Deadside, you have the Shadow Gun at your disposal, which is only effective against those in the afterworld. Your quest will take you to both realms as you fight to keep Legion from unleashing demons and evil spirits on the Liveside. The future of the world as we know it is in your hands  and you are the only one who can defeat Legion.
rating_content: Animated Blood and Gore, Animated Violence

title: Klustar
description: KLUSTAR takes TETRIS and twists it around. Rather than moving falling pieces, you must move and rotate a group of pieces that is stuck together. The goal is to get the moving pieces to stick together, forming a solid square of blocks. One that is done, the square disappears and the remaining pieces collapse inward, creating more room to maneuver. If you miss a piece, it will stick to the sides of the play area and cannot be removed. The game ends when the cluster of pieces becomes so big that it cannot fit into the screen. With 16 skill levels, the degree of challenge is always appropriate. If friends want to join the action, they can via a link cable. See how long you can last in KLUSTAR.

title: Hidden & Dangerous
description: Hidden & Dangerous is a 3D action-strategy game, set during the Second World War. The player is able to control a group of Allies' paratroopers in special missions in enemy territories situated throughout Europe. The player can control any of four commando members from several 3D views and, at the same time, he can program on a tactical map the tasks for the rest of the team.The story starts in 1941, and the missions continue to the very end of the war in 1945. The game is divided into six campaigns; each takes place in a different part of Europe. Overall, the game has 23 graphically unique missions, set in France, Norway, Yugoslavia, and even in Prague during the last days of the War.

title: Crush Roller
description: The exciting chase of a lifetime is on! Finish painting roads before the monsters stop you in this colorful Neo Geo remake of the maze chase arcade game. Grab those amusing, pesky irksters!

title: Star Trek: Starfleet Command
description: This is a tactical Star Trek fans dream come true. In Star Trek: Starfleet Command, create your own character in the Star Trek universe and follow out a dynamic campaign with your own ship.

title: Neo Turf Masters [NGPC]
description: This is a golf game that was first released in 1996. The player picks one of six available golfers and competes on a number of golf courses around the world, including Japan (Fujiyama Oriental Golf Club), America (Grand Canyon Golf Course), Australia (Blue Lagoon Golf Course) and Germany (Baden Golf Course). The game features two modes of play. The first is Stroke Play, in which the player attempts to get the best score by playing all 18 holes. The second is Match Play, in which two players compete to see who can win more of the 18 holes. Grab a friend and get ready to hit the fairway.

title: NIRA Intense Import Drag Racing
description: The top 10 drivers and cars from the National Import Racing Association are ready to tear it up in this incredible drag racing simulation. An in-car cockpit allows you to see all of the gauges and meters that the pros do, and a comprehensive paint shop lets you customize the appearance of your vehicle to suit your taste. Of course, everything under the hood can be tweaked as well, and you can even build your own car from the ground up. Play alone or challenge dozens of racers via the Internet.
rating_content: Suitable for Persons Ages Six and Older

title: WWF Attitude
description: Wrestling fans better have a lot of free time, because WWF ATTITUDE for the PlayStation if full of enough options and modes to keep any gamer busy. There are more than 30 wrestlers to choose from such as The Rock, Stone Cold Steve Austin, The Undertaker, and the late Owen Hart. Every grappler can perform the same basic moves, but they can also perform signature attacks. Different button combinations are used to perform every move, and they range in difficulty depending on how complex the action is. There are several play modes available, with a focus on multiplayer battles. While there are 15 single-player modes, there are 21 multiplayer options that allow up to four people at once in the ring. One of the best features of the game is The Create-a-Player, which is about as deep and intuitive as they come. You have control over everything, from your wrestler's appearance to his strengths and weaknesses. WWF ATTITUDE is a gigantic single-player blast, but it also has a huge multiplayer aspect, making this a great title for everyone.
rating_content: Mild Language, Realistic Violence, Suggestive Themes

title: TNN Motorsports Hardcore Heat
description: Time to hop into a dirt-thumping dune buggy or tricked-out truck and race your way to victory in TNN MOTORSPORTS HARDCORE HEAT. The world of off-road driving action is yours for the taking as you compete in varied modes like Championship, Time Attack, and an invaluable Practice mode in cars you've modified down to their brakes, suspension, and even stylish decals. You begin the game with four challenging tracks and have the ability to open two more as the maneuvering continues. What kind of terrain will you be steering your shock-blasting machines across? Slippery snow, crunching dirt, splashing mud, hot sand, and even the relative safety of pavement will put your driving skills to the test. Your opponents utilize clever artificial intelligence so you'll have to be cunning as well as quick to win. A hard guitar rock soundtrack and quips and taunts from competing drivers round out the Nashville Network-licensed madness. TNN MOTORSPORTS HARDCORE HEAT is a downshifting, rump-bumping ride of rally racing gameplay glory.

title: Trickstyle
description: Grab your hoverboard and take to the skies in the futuristic super-speed air racing of TRICKSTYLE for the Dreamcast. There's no need for wheels here as you choose your stylish racer and board and head for the Velodrome. At the Velodrome staging area you enter a room and decide which of the 18 tracks you'd like to strut your airborne stuff on. Race on three continents the USA, United Kingdom, and Japan on sci-fi tracks that will challenge your every reflex and skill. After successfully completing five races, there's no time to rest as you face off against a champion boss character. Emerge victorious and you'll unlock brand new hoverboards to compete with. Just as in snowboarding, you'll pull off wild tricks, spins, and jaw-dropping jumps while blazing across inventive courses. Slip between narrow passageways, avoid buildings, dive under bridges, and hop over fences as you blitz towards the finish. TRICKSTYLE includes a slamming techno soundtrack, spaced-out sound effects, and even a racing mini-game for your VMU.

title: Expendable
description: In the year 2463 the Earth is in jeopardy of alien invasion and destruction. The planet's only hope for survival is a group of genetically bred soldiers known as Expendables. The sole purpose of your existence, as one of the Expendables, is to seek and destroy any threat to your race. In this case, it's the alien race known as the Charva. You've been trained to use every weapon imaginable, including Gatling guns, flame -throwers, lasers, and grenades. Make yourself even more deadly by grabbing various power-ups that will modify your weapons and make them more effective. While your main objective is to kill, there will also be some puzzles that you must solve in order to progress through the game. If you want to double your pleasure, recruit a friend and give the Charva a double dose of punishment.
rating_content: Animated Blood and Gore, Animated Violence

title: Mortal Kombat Gold
description: The MORTAL KOMBAT series makes its way to the Dreamcast with MORTAL KOMBAT GOLD. This is an enhanced version of MORTAL KOMBAT 4, which features the MK universe in full 3D for the first time. This time it's a battle of good vs. evil, with the winner ruling the universe. Choose your gladiator from an all-star list of characters, which includes Baraka, Mileena, Reiko, Shinnok, Scorpion, Reptile, Quan Chi, Sub-Zero, Tanya, Raiden, Sonya, Kung Lao, Liu Kang, Kitana, Kai, Jax, Johnny Cage, Fujin, Jarek, and Cyrax. Put your character to the test in one of five modes Practice, Tournament, Arcade, Team, and Endurance and see if you can defeat the enemy. Master each character's special moves and try to unlock the hidden fighters embedded within the game, or just sit back and watch the ending of each character's story.
rating_content: Animated Blood and Gore, Animated Violence

title: Blue Stinger
description: Survival horror game from Climax Graphics. The basic gist of the story is that a member of ESER (Especial Sea Rescue) Eliot Ballade, witnesses an incident, in which a nearby island, known as Dinosaur Island, is engulfed in a shockwave of energy. The blast of energy damages the boat that Eliot is vacationing on, killing the boat's captain and knocking our hero unconscious-only to awaken some time later to the site of Nephilim, an angelic looking spirit that saves Eliot's life. Eliot must explore the monster-infested island and make prudent use of ammunition, and to stay healthy enough to progress through the game unraveling the story in the process. Monster kills register in the form of coinage that flows forth from their carcasses, which is in turn used to purchase ammunition, health food and health drinks.

title: The House of the Dead 2
description: In the first HOUSE OF THE DEAD, you and your partner were sent to the Curian Mansion to investigate Dr. Curian, a mad scientist who was experimenting with the dead. Once you had cleaned out the house and eliminated the doctor, you figured the world was once again safe. Unfortunately, a man named Goldman decided to continue the doctor's research, only this time the zombies are overrunning an entire town. Once again, it's up to you and your partner to clean out the zombies and restore peace. Quick decisions are a must, but be careful that you don't tag an innocent citizen--keep your eyes open for special power-ups and upgrades. You'll have a variety of modes to choose from, including Arcade, Original, Training, Boss, and Ranking. Play this first-person on-rails shooter with the standard Dreamcast controller, or give yourself the authentic arcade feel and hook up your light gun.

title: Final Fantasy VIII
description: A member of an elite military team, Squall is forced into a conflict beyond imagination.  To survive, he must contend with a desperate rival, a powerful sorceress, and his own mysterious dreams.The RPG master craftsmen at Square roar back after the success of Final Fantasy VII with this, an even more breathtaking, expansive and emotional adventure. An epic story based on the theme of love, set in a massive new world, Final Fantasy VIII features nearly an hour of stunning motion-captured CG cinemas seamlessly integrated into gameplay. In gameplay, the new junction system allows characters to be customized with powerful magic spells drawn from enemies for more complex RPG interaction.
rating_content: Animated Violence, Mild Language, Suggestive Themes

title: Shadow Man
description: Explore the world of voodoo with Shadow Man. You play the role of Mike LeRoi, an ordinary man with one unique trait: the ability to traverse between the worlds of the living and the dead. Armageddon is fast approaching, and you're the only person who can stop it. Under the guidance of voodoo priestess, Mama Nettie, your mission is to absorb the blackest souls on the Deadside before an evil entity known as Legion does. As the Shadow Man, you have different abilities while on the Liveside, including the ability to use weapons, like a shotgun and machine gun. While on the Deadside, you have the Shadow Gun at your disposal, which is only effective against those in the afterworld. Your quest will take you to both realms as you fight to keep Legion from unleashing demons and evil spirits on the Liveside. The future of the world as we know it is in your hands  and you are the only one who can defeat Legion.
rating_content: Animated Blood and Gore, Animated Violence

title: Hybrid Heaven
description: Are you ready for a game that combines role-playing stat management and level raising, a fighting game's combo system, and a third-person adventure's exploration and puzzle-solving action? Put these classic gameplay elements together and you have HYBRID HEAVEN from Konami. You play as the hybrid called Diaz in a science-fiction drama that takes place primarily underground in New York City. The plot is mysterious and involved (and is advanced with powerful cutscenes), but the action is straightforward. You are armed with a defuser gun that lets you take out enemy laser probes and bots. You'll have to be quick to avoid flaming barriers and traps, and you'll also have to be clever to solve box-pushing, ledge-crawling, key-gathering puzzles. You'll also need speedy reflexes to battle humans and "biogenetically enhanced" monsters in hand-to-hand combat as you punch, kick, and stomp your enemies into mush. Fighting, exploring, and adventuring blend together in the hi-tech, dark, and dangerous world of intrigue that is HYBRID HEAVEN.

title: Outcast
description: Outcast is a 3D action-adventure title in which the player takes command of a team out to stop an experiment that threatens the very existence of the earth. Utilizing voxel technology for the land and polygons for the characters the game exhibits spectacular graphics without the use of 3D acceleration.
rating_content: Animated Blood, Animated Violence, Strong Language

title: AeroWings
description: AeroWings is a flight simulation for Dreamcast in which you play a stunt pilot performing acrobatic maneuvers with the Blue Impulse, Japan's version of the Blue Angels. Gameplay focuses on stunts and formations rather than dogfighting and combat.

title: Power Stone
description: A classic 3D fighting game from Capcom, Power Stone is an outrageous beat-'em-up style game where players go head to head against an opponent in best of three round match ups.  Arcade mode allows a single character to put their skills to the test against a lineup of computer controlled opponents, while versus battles allow chaotic multiplayer bouts in the dangerous and weapon-filled arenas.

title: Monaco Grand Prix
description: If you're tired of the NASCAR circuit and want to feel the rush of open-wheeled racing, then strap yourself in to MONACO GRAND PRIX. You'll have 16 real-life tracks to race on, which have been painstakingly recreated to give you the feeling of being right on the track with the pros. The Arcade mode lets rookie drivers jump right into the action, letting them race without having to worry about the small details. Gearheads and hardcore fans can take a crack at the Simulation mode and control every aspect of the game, from the car's setup to the competition's skill. If you're feeling nostalgic, try the Retro mode and get behind the wheel of some of the fastest cars from the 1950s. But these rides aren't as driver-friendly as today's cars, so it'll take some practice and patience before you start shredding up the track. So, if you're ready to feel the wind whipping through your hair at 200 mph, get your hands on MONACO GRAND PRIX and let the good times roll.

title: NFL Blitz 2000
description: Midway returns to their hit football game with NFL BLITZ 2000 for the Dreamcast. The game is an upgrade from the arcade version of NFL BLITZ â99. There are numerous additions that make the game more exciting: you can play with up to four players: two on defense, two on offense. You can also write your own plays and use them later on. The game is like a normal football game, but with much more speed and far fewer rules. The result is a fun (if unrealistic) look at the NFL. Every team is faithfully represented, as are the players. This new version adds an On Fire mode, which allows players that have caught three consecutive passes to gain a special unlimited Turbo feature. This lets the player run much faster than normal and gives the player a distinct advantage. Anyone who likes to recreate games with their favorite teams but doesn't like the rules that slow down gameplay, NFL BLITZ 2000 is the perfect solution!

title: AirForce Delta
description: You're a fighter pilot trying to take out various targets while dogfighting with enemy planes in this mission-based flight combat simulation. 30 different aircraft are available to fly, from legendary favorites like the F-4 Phantom, F-14 Tomcat and A-10 Thunderbolt to cutting-edge fighters including the Mig 29, Su-27 and the top secret F-22 Raptor. 20+ missions are available, all with their own detailed briefings and strategic objectives.

title: Frogger [1998]
description: Roads and rivers can be dangerous places when you're a little amphibian trying to get home! The original arcade hit FROGGER comes to Game Boy Color. You must guide the little green guy across a street, over a river, and into the safety of his home. But you're crossing a highway in the middle of rush hour, so you'd better watch out for speedy cars and trucks that look to flatten you. Once you cross the street, you'll have to get across the river, which is filled with floating logs. Some of those logs are crocodiles though, so be careful you don't end up as someone's midday snack. You'll also have to look out for snakes and turtles, which can also ruin your day. Along the way, you can gobble up some flies and rescue other frogs to earn some extra points. As the game progresses traffic moves faster, the river rages harder, and everything gets a lot more dangerous! FROGGER is compatible with all existing Game Boy systems.
platforms: GBC TVgame 5200 Intv Coleco Cell Arcade 2600 Apple-II SMS SNES Ody2 Gen Xbox 360 WinPhone iPhone G.com 400/800

title: Centipede
description: The classic arcade hit CENTIPEDE comes to Game Boy Color in this slightly enhanced version of the old favorite. This one- or two-player game has you firing pesticide at an oncoming centipede that is threatening the garden. As the pest weaves its way through the mushrooms dispersed throughout the screen, you'll have to use strategy as well as quickness to fight it off. The classic gameplay is replicated perfectly in this arcade port.  You can play two players competitively by alternating on a single Game Boy, or grab two copies of the game and a Game Boy Link Cable to cooperate against the buggy bad guys. CENTIPEDE is enhanced for Game Boy Color, with all new brightly colored graphics that will take you back to the arcades of the '80s. Centipede is compatible with all Game Boy systems.
platforms: GBC TI-99 Intv Cell 2600 G.com Arcade WinPhone Coleco 7800 iPhone 400/800 5200 GB

title: Braveheart
description: Braveheart is an ambitious undertaking for Red Lemon Studios. The game attempts to combine large-scale military strategy in a detailed 2D world with the excitement of 3D tactical battles. Your goal is to unite the warring Scottish clans through either diplomacy or battle before the English secure complete domination. It is a vast and open-ended game that could be endless fun if only the gameplay were not so tedious.

title: Quest for Camelot
description: King Arthur has lost his legendary sword, Excalibur. Now the evil Sir Ruber is out to claim Camelot. Since the King is unable to fight, he trusts a young girl named Kayley to fight for him and save his Kingdom. You take the role of Kayley as you explore nine worlds and a total of 60 areas in search of Excalibur. Along the way, you will have to learn how to use several devices including a slingshot, snorkel, and grappling hook to perform tasks and solve puzzles. Naturally, Sir Ruber has henchmen out to stop you, but use your sword to dispatch them. As the game progresses, you will learn a powerful spin-attack as well as dart- and lunge-attacks. Will Kayley be able to save Camelot? Will finding Excalibur be enough to help King Arthur? Find the answers to these questions by playing QUEST FOR CAMELOT.

title: Re-Volt
description: Grab your radio controller (or in this case, your controller) and get ready for RC action. You have more than 28 different cars to choose from (each rated differently for speed, acceleration, and weight), though most of these are locked at the beginning of the game. As you progress through the game's four championship circuits, you'll gain access to more cars.

title: Shadow Man
description: Explore the world of voodoo with Shadow Man. You play the role of Mike LeRoi, an ordinary man with one unique trait: the ability to traverse between the worlds of the living and the dead. Armageddon is fast approaching, and you're the only person who can stop it. Under the guidance of voodoo priestess, Mama Nettie, your mission is to absorb the blackest souls on the Deadside before an evil entity known as Legion does. As the Shadow Man, you have different abilities while on the Liveside, including the ability to use weapons, like a shotgun and machine gun. While on the Deadside, you have the Shadow Gun at your disposal, which is only effective against those in the afterworld. Your quest will take you to both realms as you fight to keep Legion from unleashing demons and evil spirits on the Liveside. The future of the world as we know it is in your hands  and you are the only one who can defeat Legion.
rating_content: Animated Blood and Gore, Animated Violence

title: Gulf War: Operation Desert Hammer
description: Gulf War Operation Desert Hammer is a classic arcade-action shooter; a patriotic game of 3D tank combat set in the present day (2001) Persian Gulf. As commander of a prototype M12 tank, nicknamed "The Hammer," players use an array of weapons and the aid of additional military units to 'go back and finish what we started with Desert Storm.' Gulf War Operation Desert Hammer offers real-world locations and missions with ease-of-use, arcade-style, single and multi-player gameplay.

title: Curse You! Red Baron
description: Forget jet engines and afterburners!!! Return to a time when humans first took to the sky for face-to-face battle. Sit in the cockpit of the world's first combat aircraft, where your skill, tactics, and bravery will determine whether you stay up or go down.

title: Bomberman Fantasy Race
description: Where can you ride a kangaroo or a rhino to victory? In Bomberman Fantasy Race choose a rider and an animal and then hit one of the seven courses.

title: The New Tetris
description: Think you've seen everything that TETRIS has to offer? Go beyond all preconceived notions of the mind-boggling puzzle classic, as you take on fresh challenges in all-new environments. The aim is the same: place the falling shapes into lines, leaving as few gaps as possible. Once you complete a line, it disappears, giving you more space in which to operate. Whether you're a seasoned veteran or a newcomer to the fabled TETRIS series, you'll appreciate the improved modes of play. One welcome addition to this installment is the TNT feature, which allows you to see the next three pieces before they are released to you. You can even earn additional points by building gold and obsidian squares on the playing field. As if that weren't enough, you can actually build the Seven Wonders of the Ancient World with up to four players in collaboration! The seven different play environments Japan, Africa, and Celtic Great Britain to name a few each feature its own unique animation and music, and you can even play classic TETRIS if that all gets to be too much.

title: NCAA Football 2000
description: NCAA FOOTBALL 2000 has all the gameplay options you expect from a college football sim: Exhibition, Tournament, Great Games, Season, Practice, and Dynasty. You also get 114 division I-A and 26 new division I-AA teams, meaning you're likely to find your favorite squad on the roster. If you're feeling creative, you can also take advantage of the game's Create-A-Player and Create-A-Play features, as well as the new Create-A-School feature. This new mode lets you create a school, and then take its team through multiple seasons in Dynasty mode. You can also scout players and get them interested in playing football for your school by sending different members of the coaching staff to their hometowns. If you're looking for a college football game that has it all, NCAA FOOTBALL 2000 might just be what you need.

title: Jagged Alliance 2
description: Jagged Alliance 2 is a RPG/Strategy hybrid where you lead an army of up to eighteen, quirky mercenaries on the island state of Arulco, which is ruled by the evil, despotic Queen Deirdranna. Through a campaign of terror, her army maintains control and exerts her will. Seeking to regain his throne, the rightful ruler hires you for $35,000 to assemble a rebel force to overthrow the queen. After recruiting a group of mercenaries and equipping them, you are wisked to the island to begin the resistance. As you capture mines, airports and cities, you must train local militias to defend your assets. As your army gains strength, you will see if you have the skills, organization and men to liberate Arulco.
rating_content: Animated Violence, Mature Sexual Themes, Strong Language

title: Warhammer 40,000: Rites of War
description: Combining the accessible turn-based style of Panzer General II with the gorgeous and horrifying imagery of the battletorn WarHammer 40K universe, Rites of War brings you a strategic challenge that will blow your mind. 40K figures fully animate as they move, attack, and die. Ambient map animations bring the battlefield to life.

title: PenPen TriIcelon
description: Take a trip to the mystical land of the Iced Planet and get to know the PenPen. The PenPen resemble animals you might see on Earth: the PenPen, PenOctopus, PenDog, PenHippo, PenShark, and PenSeal. Bored with life on a frozen planet, the PenPen decided create their own version of the humans' triathlon, known as the Tri-Icelon. Consisting of ice walking, belly surfing, and swimming, the Tri-Icelon is the ultimate athletic competition on the Iced Planet. Take control of your own PenPen and enter him (or her) in the events on four distinct courses: Sweets, a course made up of cookies and candy; Toys, which is constructed from building blocks and other toys; Horrors, which features a graveyard and a haunted house; and Jungle, which is full of wild animals and residential huts. Will your PenPen win the title of World's Greatest PenPen? It's up to you to find out in PENPEN TRI-ICELON.

title: Soul of the Samurai
description: A 3D action game with some light adventure elements. Play as one of two characters whose stories intertwine as they fight to stop an evil warlord scheming to overthrow the shogunate. One relies on her speed and her ninja tricks, while the other uses his sheer strength and the greater reach of his samurai swords. Battle enemies in fast, brutal combat, and search the prerendered environments for items.

title: Sonic Adventure
description: The hedgehog with an attitude makes his triumphant return to the world of videogames in Sonic Adventure. Using the power of the Dreamcast, Sonic has been catapulted into the third dimension with style. Racing at supersonic speeds through nearly 50 gorgeous, fully 3D levels, Sonic will have to adapt to the new challenges and dangers invented by the evil Dr. Robotnik. Sonic knows when he's outmatched, though, so he's recruited five friends including Amy Rose, Tails, and Knuckles to help him put a stop to Robotnik's evil scheme. Each playable character features different abilities, playing through levels differently and seeing the story evolve from their own perspectives. Players can even collect tiny creatures called Chao, save them to a VMU, and raise them on the go   then bring them back into the game world for competition! Your favorite blue hedgehog enters the next generation of games with style in Sonic Adventure.
platforms: DC Xbox 360 PS3 PC DC GCN

title: Flag to Flag
description: Experience the nose-to-tail battle that is CART racing. This high-speed, action-packed racing game will pump your pulse into overdrive with its 3D realism and challenging courses. Sega's first-ever CART simulation brings the world's fastest closed-circuit auto racing to Sega Dreamcast. Fully licensed by CART and designed with the help of CART's champion Team Rahal, Sega has created the most accurate and realistic racing game yet for console gaming. Hold on tight as you race through 19 real-life tracks and confront a variety of weather and road conditions. Details such as debris hitting your windshield will make you forget about that static chair you're sitting in. So step on the gas and don't stop till you screech across the finish line.

title: Tokyo Xtreme Racer
description: You're cruising along a freeway in Tokyo when you see someone challenging you out of the corner of your eye. You flash your headlights, take on the dare, and you're off speeding down the highway in TOKYO XTREME RACER. Compete one-on-one in a series of sprints, which take place on two different Japanese highways. Your goal is simple: lead your opponent for a longer period of time than he is able to lead you.  Each driver has a meter that begins to count down when they are trailing. The farther the winning car is ahead, the faster the trailing car's meter runs down; the first meter to run out loses. Customize your car's stats and improve its performance if you're not winning like you think you should be. Beware of hitting dividers and walls, as they will drag your vehicle down costing you valuable speed. Earn money when you beat opponents and use it to upgrade your car, so you'll be ready to take on faster members of Tokyo's toughest racing gangs in TOKYO XTREME RACER.

title: Hot Wheels: Turbo Racing
description: Do you remember playing with Hot Wheels, driving them along imaginary tracks and jumps, and making the cars do all sorts of acrobatic maneuvers? That same fun and excitement has been put on the PlayStation with HOT WHEELS TURBO RACING. Choose from a roster of 40 different Hot Wheels cars; some are really good at stunts while others are just plain fast. All of the 12 tracks are filled with twists, turns, corkscrews, loops, and jumps. The most important aspect is the jumps; once in the air, the player can have the car pull off helicopter spins, barrel rolls, and flips. Concentrate on tricks with the Air Time Challenge, where the most spectacular stunt wins. HOT WHEELS TURBO RACING recreates the youthful joy of driving at breakneck speeds on the living room floor.

title: Echo Night
description: Richard Osmond returned home to discover that his father had disappeared. Trying to find some clues as to his father's whereabouts, Richard stumbles across an old key that unlocks the grandfather clock. Opening the clock reveals a secret passage and large red book that explains the Rockwell dynasty. It appears that the Rockwells and 45 other guests disappeared one year earlier on the luxury boat Orpheus. The Rockwells' disappearance is related to a murderer who is possessed by an evil red knife the very same psychopath that Richard's father was trying to capture. Travel through time, help the elder Osmond capture the murderer, release the souls of those murdered by the evil knife, and discover the link between the Rockwells and the murderer. Use a point-and-click interface to explore the environs, talk to characters, and pick up items. Will Richard be able to save all of the souls and find his father? Echo Night contains the answers to these questions and many more.

title: Hydro Thunder
description: Midway has brought the arcade action of HYDRO THUNDER into your living room and onto the Dreamcast. Select from 13 boats, ranging from 16-cylinder gas-guzzlers to futuristic prototypes. Each boat handles differently, so you'll have to learn on the fly as you hit jumps at 130 mph. Be sure to keep your eyes peeled, because you just might find a shortcut or two if you're lucky. There are also 13 unique courses to race on: Lost Island, Thunder Park, Arctic Circle, Greek Isles, Lake Powell, The Far East, Venice Canals, Ship Graveyard, New York Disaster, Nile Adventure, Hydro Speedway, Catacomb, and Castle Von Dandy. Nothing is free in this world though, as you'll have to be competitive to unlock all the tracks. Take on the computer-controlled boats or challenge a friend with awesome split-screen action. With amazing graphics and true-to-life physics, HYDRO THUNDER puts you right in the middle of the action. Just remember to take your Dramamine.
platforms: DC N64 PC PS Arcade PS2

title: Ready 2 Rumble Boxing
description: If you're looking for some over-the-top boxing action, then get your hands on READY 2 RUMBLE BOXING for the Dreamcast. Featuring world-famous ring announcer Michael Buffer who bellows the familiar, "Let's get ready to rummmble!" at the outset of every match you're in for some fast-paced, in-your-face action with READY 2 RUMBLE BOXING. Step into the ring with one of 16 boxers, including Afro Thunder, Boris Knokimov, Salua Tua, Rocket Samchay, Tank Thrasher, Kemo Claw, "Big" Willie Johnson, Butcher Brown, Angel Rivera, Faz Motar, Lulu Valentine, Jimmy Blood, and several hidden characters who can be unlocked through gameplay. Each fighter has his or her own personality and boxing style to master, meaning you'll be spending some quality time with this game. Train your fighter in preparation for a title match, or just play in arcade mode and lay the smack down.

title: Sled Storm
description: Jump into the driver's seat of a snowmobile and race over hill and dale in SLEDSTORM. There are more than six drivers you can choose from, each with a unique sled that is rated in top speed, acceleration, handling, stability, and tricks. After choosing the appropriate alter ego, use the Practice mode to get a feel for the machine and to learn the bumps and twists of a track. When you are ready for competition, try the Championship mode. In the Open Mountain Championship, the only goal is to get from point A to point B as quickly as possible. If you're feeling bold, try the Super SnoCross, which calls for you to navigate a course filled with jumps where you score points by performing tricks. When your friends come over, you can get them into the game with a multi-tap. See how much air you can get in SLEDSTORM.

title: NFL GameDay 2000
description: The world champion Denver Broncos approach the line-of-scrimmage, the quarterback takes the snap, he feigns left then delivers the delay hand-off to Terrell Davis, who skirts right, turns on the speed hitting the hole between the offensive tackle and the center and explodes into mid-field for a 23 yard gain. Well in this scenario, the quarterback is not the retired John Elway, but his replacement Bubby Brister, and the game is not a live broadcast but another go at 989 Studio's NFL GameDay 2000. The 2000 edition features more balanced plays, better CPU AI (including a pre-snap AI scheme), and more than 200 new motion captured animations.

title: NCAA GameBreaker 2000
description: Loaded with a huge number of gameplay modes and extras, GAMEBREAKER 2000 is the ultimate college football simulation. In terms of gameplay you have Scrimmage, Fantasy League, Tournament Season, Bowl Season, and the new Career Mode. In Career Mode, you can take on the role of either the head coach or the offensive or defensive coordinators for any of the Division I-A teams. You start at a small school, but as you accumulate victories you can earn promotions into the bigger and more lucrative programs, where you can ultimately make a run for the National Championship. You can choose from 114 NCAA Division I-A teams, as well as 50 classic teams from the past. The game features a TV-style presentation, with Keith Jackson handling the play-by-play. You also get a Play Editor, where you can customize and create your own plays, and you can also draft players into NFL GAMEDAY 2000.

title: System Shock 2
description: Choose your path, choose your weapons, choose your skills and then immerse yourself in what is arguably one of the most frightening, eerie and simply amazing titles around. It's a kind of action-intensive RPG that few can even come close to touching.set a new approachable precedent for all first-person perspective games. It's loaded with so many extras that exploration and interaction were necessities. Cybernetic monsters, rogue robots and a bunch of mutants called "The Many" dot an adventure that should not be missed by anyone with a backbone and a brain. Watch out for them psi- monkeys!
rating_content: Animated Blood and Gore, Animated Violence

title: Madden NFL 2000
description: Madden NFL 2000 delivers the most in-depth NFL football experience on the PlayStation with all-new motion-captured hits and user-controlled moves including breakable wrap tackles, gang tackling, diving catches and new TD celebrations. Revolutionary polygon player models, scaled to NFL players' actual height and weight, show every devastating hit and user-controlled juke moves in amazing detail.

title: Re-Volt
description: Grab your radio controller (or in this case, your keyboard or joystick) and get ready for RC to hit your PC. You have more than 28 different cars to choose from (each rated differently for speed, acceleration, and weight), though most of these are locked at the beginning of the game. As you progress through the game's four championship circuits, you'll gain access to more cars.

title: Chessmaster II
description: Chess is one of the oldest board games on Earth; even the Egyptians played an early form of it. Now, chess comes to the PlayStation with THE CHESSMASTER II. Choose from 24 animated chess sets, including Mycenae, Egyptian, Isle of Lewis, and Stanton. Try to checkmate your friends, or challenge one of the 64 computer opponents (each with a different style of play and varying degrees of skill), or try to beat one of the 30 Grandmaster profiles. You'll never miss an opening in the 3D mode, since you can rotate the camera to any angle you want. Or, if you prefer, play on a flat 2D board. THE CHESSMASTER II brings the thrills and challenges of chess to life.

title: Command & Conquer: Tiberian Sun
description: Real-time strategy game. The much-anticipated latest game in the Command and Conquer series. Set in the future, the game hinges on the control of the resource Tiberium - a poisonous metal that emerges from the ground and is used to make weapons. You play one of two sides the Global Defense Initiative (good guys) or the Brotherhood of Nod (global Mafia-type organization) in self-contained missions placed within an overall narrative. There are 12 main missions for each side with additional subset objectives.
rating_content: Mild Language, Realistic Blood, Realistic Violence

title: Pac-Man: Special Color Edition
description: The original franchise character can now be put in the palm of your hand with PAC-MAN: Special Color Edition for the Game Boy Color. The game is simple: you're a big yellow disk with a mouth, and your goal is to clear a maze of dots while avoiding four ghosts. As luck would have it, there are four large dots, referred to as "power pellets," that will turn the ghosts blue and allow Pac-Man to eat them for even more bonus points. All of the original levels from the arcade game are included, as well as a full version of the puzzle game PAC ATTACK. Now you can relive the early days of the arcade with PAC-MAN: Special Color Edition.
platforms: GBC PC Xbox One PS4 5200 LCD NES Wii C64 GB Arcade 2600 3DS Cell iPad Intv VIC-20 NGPC Wii U 400/800 WinPhone

title: Tiny Tank: Up Your Arsenal
description: Mix quirky humor, science fiction and action-packed tank battles and you'll have Sony's TINY TANK. You play as the wisecracking yellow mini-tank of the title. It's your duty to stop the dastardly Mutank and his robot army from decimating what's left of mankind. Through 25 intense, varying levels, TINY TANK rolls, shoots, and quips his way towards victory. Collect nanometal and boost Tiny's powers, collect p-brains to increase smarts, and configure your weapons as you see fit. Perhaps best of all, send out your remote-controlled Teeny Weeny Tanks to scout, gather resources, or provide protection. Twelve mission-based levels are accessible and a menacing boss awaits at the end of each so be prepared! If a multiplayer contest is what you crave, a two-player Versus mode is also available. With quick, almost non-stop action and loads of humor at the ready, TINY TANK is primed to blast some fun into your gaming sessions.
rating_content: Animated Violence, Comic Mischief, Mild Language

title: Pac-Man
description: Gobble, gobble, gulp! Who's munching Power Pellets? Who's zipping around the maze at top speed, chomping up ghosts and scoring big points? It's Pac-Man, the world's hungriest character! And he's got the munchies! Devour a fruit treat and get a big bonus score. But if you're caught by the spooky hunters roaming the maze, you're ghostflakes! Use the warp tunnel for a quick escape, and swallow up a Power Pellet to temporarily make Pac-Man an unstoppable eater!This NeoGeo Pocket Color version of the classic arcade game Pac-Man offers two versions of play to accomodate the limited resolution of the portable console: Scrolling and Full Screen. Scrolling is the pixel-for-pixel port, but the screen scrolls to follow Pac-Man through the maze. The Full Screen mode cuts the detail to fit the entire maze on-screen, allowing you to see the ghosts anywhere on the stage in a condensed viewing of the game maze.
platforms: NGPC GBC PC Xbox One PS4 5200 LCD NES Wii C64 GB 2600 Arcade 3DS Cell iPad Intv VIC-20 GG WinPhone Wii U

title: Jet Moto 3
description: Get behind the controls of a hovercraft or motorcycle hybrid in Jet Moto 3. You can choose from 11 different riders with unique attributes. Get accustomed to the controls and learn the twists and turns of the game's 19 tracks in the Practice mode. When you are ready for some competition, try to win Single Races or have the best overall performance in a Circuit. The ultimate challenge comes when you try to win the championship in a Season. Should friends challenge your dominance in the water, have them try to beat you in a race or make prove their consistency with a circuit. No matter what mode you play, a new graphics engine renders the most advanced models seen in the series. Can you handle the pressure of amphibious racing? Play Jet Moto 3 and try to find your true grit.

title: Duke Nukem: Zero Hour
description: Hail to the king, baby! Duke's back, and he's badder than ever! This time he's got to take care of another alien invasion, but there's a twist -- the aliens have a time machine, and they're going back through time to take out the human race when it is most vulnerable. It is your mission to follow them back through time and stop them at all costs. Spanning across four different eras, including "Present Day," "Post-Apocalypse New York," "The Wild West," and "Victorian London," you will find the story rich and diverse. You'll have a full arsenal of weapons, including a Claw-12 Shotgun, Pipe Bombs, and Laser Trip Mines at your disposal. Tightly packed into a rich single-player experience and topped off with a thorough Multiplayer mode that supports up to four people, DUKE NUKEM: Zero Hour is definitely one game not to miss!

title: Drakan: Order of the Flame
description: When a dark force kidnaps your younger brother, it's up to you to save him and your homeland. Travel across the beautiful and deadly Drakan, trying to find the crime's perpetrator before it's too late. You'll play as Ryan, a heroine with the skills of a warrior and the brains of a wise sage. Your companion happens to be a fire-breathing dragon named Arokh, so rest assured that your enemies will be wary of your very presence. The adventure blends aerial gameplay with ground-based scenarios, delivering its results in glorious 3D detail.

title: Rat Attack
description: The traditional cat-and-mouse game is in full swing, as you play one of six Scratch Cats looking to free the world of vicious rats. Forty years ago, two lab rats were sent into space as part of an experiment. They've returned with dangerous alien secrets that could obliterate the world, and their rampage has already destroyed homes, businesses, gardens, museums, and more of Earth's precious structures. It's up to the Scratch Cats to stop the madness, as you control your cat through level after level of rat hunting. Each rat you capture gets put into your Eraticator device, but that's only the first step of the extermination: You then must carry your Eraticator to the Destructor Pad in order to end a rat's life completely. On your way to the Destructor Pad, other rats will try to bump into you, causing you to spill your captured rats and start over again. A truly hilarious and addictive game, RAT ATTACK! offers three levels of difficulty, a unique premise, and intense two-player head-to-head action to keep the replay value high.

title: Re-Volt
description: Grab your radio controller (or in this case, your controller) and get ready for RC action. You have more than 28 different cars to choose from (each rated differently for speed, acceleration, and weight), though most of these are locked at the beginning of the game. As you progress through the game's four championship circuits, you'll gain access to more cars.

title: Legacy of Kain: Soul Reaver
description: In the second chapter of the epic to Blood Open/Legacy of Kain franchise, you jump into the world of Raziel, a member in Kain's vampire army. After defying Kain's authority, you are sentenced to damnation in the Lake of the Dead. After having your body torn apart by the water that acts like acid on vampires, you are merely a shell of your former self. As an a member of the undead ranks, you have the ability to pass between the Spectral Plane and the Material Plane as you seek revenge on your former master. But you'll notice that the two realms are vastly different as are your abilities in each, which you'll have to use to your advantage on your quest for vengeance. Learn how to use the two different realms to your advantage in this adventure game that will test your logical skills as well as your fighting skills. Work your way through two vastly different worlds as you seek revenge and retribution against your former leader.

title: Um Jammer Lammy
description: Rock your way to the top of the pops with UM JAMMER LAMMY. From the mind of Rodney Greenblatt the brilliant designer of PARAPPA THE RAPPA comes this cartoon-inspired musical competition. You play as the title character Lammy, the stylish and clever lamb guitarist for the band Milkcan. On the day of your biggest gig, you must grab your guitar and compete in a variety of unusual missions in order to get to the show on time. With the assistance of your bandmates Katy Kat on bass and Mah-san on drums you follow the beat and press the controller buttons in time to the music. If you successfully match the onscreen instructions, your guitar will come to life with blistering rock and jumping pop tunes. You'll need to utilize all your rhythmic skills to put out fires, operate a buzzing chainsaw, fly a plane, and serenade sweet little babies to sleep. You can even play as the paper-thin rapper Parappa in a variety of hip-hoppin' modes. UM JAMMY LAMMY will have you bouncing to the beat as you strum and rap your way to victory.

title: Chocobo Racing
description: Your only chance to race with classic Squaresoft characters is in CHOCOBO RACING. Play the Story mode and help Chocobo as he tries to win the pieces of the legendary Blue Crystal from the other racers, which include Mog, White Mage, Chubby Chocobo, and others. If you want racing without a story, hit one of the eight tracks in the Grand Prix, Time Attack, or Relay modes. However, none of these races are ordinary: racers can collect magic stones that will allow them to cast spells to slow down the competition. Collecting multiple stones of the same type allows the racer to cast more powerful spells. With all of the action in CHOCOBO RACING, you'll be wondering who let the Chocobo out.

title: NFL Blitz 2000
description: Midway returns to the gridiron with NFL BLITZ 2000 for the Nintendo 64.  The game is an upgrade from the arcade version of NFL BLITZ '99, as there are numerous additions that make it much more exciting. You can play with up to four players (two on defense, two on offense) and write your own plays that can be used right away, or saved for later. NFL BLITZ 2000 has much more speed and far fewer rules than some of the other football games available, resulting in a fresh and fun new look at the NFL. As in the arcade version, every team and all players are faithfully represented.  This new version adds an "On Fire" mode, which allows players who have caught three consecutive passes to gain a special unlimited "turbo" feature, allowing the player to run faster than the opposition, a distinct advantage. For anyone who likes to recreate games with their favorite teams without a lot of rules, NFL BLITZ 2000 is the perfect solution!

title: Ken Griffey Jr.'s Slugfest
description: All of the action of professional baseball has been shrunk and put on the Game Boy Color with KEN GRIFFEY JR.'S SLUGFEST. You can play as any Major League team, complete with real players. Once you have the right team, play an Exhibition game to work on putting all aspects of the game together. If you want some extended competition, play a 26, 78, or 162 game Season, during which all of the performance stats for each player are tracked. If you don't want to deal with the ups and downs of a Season, skip right to the World Series and try to win it all. And if you don't have time for a full game, see how many dingers you can hit in the Home Run Derby. Will you be able to handle the pressures of professional baseball? The only way to find out is to play KEN GRIFFEY JR.'S SLUGFEST.

title: Madden NFL 2000
description: EA Sports continues to improve the motion-captured animation and framerate quality with MADDEN NFL 2000. They've added refinements and new features that give you the sense that you're watching an authentic televised NFL game, not playing a videogame. Just scored a touchdown or made an interception? Television-style camera shots will cut away to celebratory sideline reactions. You can also use the Coach Cam to preview individual player assignments. Included in the usual long list of options is route-based passing, which lets the quarterback lead the receiver. Players carrying the ball can also draw upon a newly revamped list of maneuvers. Work with eight basic offensive formations and six defensive formations to put your own personal stamp on the game. You also have control over frequency of injuries, weather conditions, quarter lengths, and game speed. You can even program how the referees call the penalties!  Quarterback accuracy, blocking ability, and run or pass ratios it's all up to you. When you add Madden's bombastic style of commentary with the play-by-play of Pat Summerall, you have another stellar installment in this successful series.
rating_content: Suitable for Persons Ages Six and Older

title: WWF Attitude
description: Sure, you have the skills, but do you have the attitude? Play as one of over 30 WWF wrestlers, or create your own brawler in this larger-than-life battle through the WWF. Up to four players can tussle in four different modes, utilizing countless wrestling styles. In Exhibition mode, you play one match only in any style: Tag Team, One-on-One, Lumberjack, Gauntlet, Tornado, or one of the many other styles available. Career mode allows you to rise through the league's ranks, facing off against the world's best in house matches or televised events. In King of the Ring, you'll take on up to eight different fighters at once trying to remain the last man standing while Pay Per View mode lets you set up your own television event: you create the venue, the match, and the name of the event. One of the game's best features is that it allows you to create any wrestler you can dream up, and test him in battle against the pros. With wrestlers like Triple H, Stone Cold, and Kane in the ring, you'd better be ready and you'd better have some attitude.
rating_content: Mild Language, Realistic Violence, Suggestive Themes

title: Dino Crisis
description: Your most primal fears grab you on this new journey into survival horror from the creators of Resident Evil and Resident Evil 2. Suspicious and terrifying... the world's most renowned scientist has disappeared and you've been recruited to investigate on a mysterious, remote island. Suddenly, out of the mist appears a predator, which has haunted mankind's imagination for centuries... experience the pure terror!
platforms: PS PSP GBC DC PS3 PC
rating_content: Animated Blood and Gore, Animated Violence

title: Road Rash 64
description: A time-tested favorite, ROAD RASH is available on the Nintendo 64. This 3D take has all of the over-the-top motorcycle combat you've come to expect from the series, with improved graphics and sound and amazingly adept handling. Your two aims: win the race and beat the crud of your opponents in the process. As you make your way through the single-player game, you'll be invited to join one of two biker gangs, who can provide a degree of protection (at the very least, they won't kill you). Whether you choose a durable powerhouse or an agile motorbike, you'll love the high-octane crashes that give this game its title. Breathtaking animations take center stage, as the bikes skid out and the riders flip through the air like rag dolls in a warehouse explosion. The multiplayer options are not to be missed; as you try your hand at Lap Races, a Deathmatch, an inventive version of Tag, or some leisurely Pedestrian Hunting. Throw in music by such popular recording artists as the Mermen and Sugar Ray, and you've got a real classic.

title: Asteroids [1999]
description: The biggest arcade hit in history hits again on Game Boy! The arcade classic is back to rock the new millennium with more addictive gameplay than ever before. Prepare yourself for the ultimate intergalactic blastfest. With Dual Compatibility, you can blast away level after level of Asteroids in color with Game Boy Color or in black-and-while on the original Game Boy system. Take on hyperspace worlds, from brutal suns to a deadly black hole. Equip with one of three asteroid ships and find weapons that can be collected in each level, from ramming shields to homing missiles. And take on a friend in fast-paced multiplayer action. Included modes are pass-and-play and two-player simultaneous Game Ling play (only available on GBC.) You can even find the original version hidden in the game!

title: Duke Nukem
description: Everyone's favorite alien-smashing bad boy arrives on Game Boy Color in DUKE NUKEM. In this single-player, side-scrolling action shooter, you play as the man himself as he fends off an extra-terrestrial invasion once again. Duke is going to have a talk with the invading forces  Unfortunately for them, Duke tends to let his shotgun do the talking. Collect a veritable arsenal of weapons including a flamethrower and a machine gun to help you make 25 different enemies eat lead. You'll also pilot a couple of different alien vehicles to increase your destructive capabilities as you blast your way through 16 different levels, each with its own colorful backdrop. Do you have what it takes to uphold Duke's alien-busting reputation and save the world again? You can save up to eight files of progress using the game's built-in battery backup. DUKE NUKEM is for Game Boy Color systems only.

title: G-Police: Weapons of Justice
description: The G-Police are exhausted after their last battle with terrorists. Unfortunately, small gangs are taking advantage of the situation and wreaking even more havoc on the city. With crime on the rise, the Marines have been called into the city to help maintain control. However, they are a few days away, and by the time they arrive, the gangs will have become full-blown crime syndicates. Now you must use five different vehicles, two airborne gun ships, the Havoc and Venom; a bipedal assault mech, the Raptor; an armored troop transport, the Rhino; and a Corsair space ship to take a bite out of crime. With 30 missions and a wide range of mission objectives (including seek-and-destroy missions along with routine police patrols), there is plenty to do. Can you handle the pressure of trying to keep crime under control in G-POLICE: Weapons of Justice?

title: Yars' Revenge [1999]
description: The classic Atari 2600 game YAR'S REVENGE has made its way to the Game Boy Color.
